Body:
Description: Hi,

I would like to schedule a meeting to discuss the following risk identified by Pingcastle: Hardened Paths have been modified to lower the security level.

The agenda for the meeting would be to review and discuss how to remediate this risk from our AD.

Please let me know your availability for Thursday 27th February.

Kind Regards,

Atif Rashid
Next Steps Updated: Wait for customer that mentioned this is still in review with their architect team to understand the risk impact of implementing these changes.
What We've Learned Updated: Customer wanted to discuss the risk Hardened Paths have been modified to lower the security level, identified by Pingcastle
